ingredients.ingredient: 2 teaspoons Hidden Valley® Original Ranch® Salad Dressing and Seasoning Mix

cookingTips: Pat chicken dry before coating for better seasoning adherence
Bake at 400°F until internal temperature reaches 165°F, about 25-30 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This minimalist recipe relies on quality seasoning and proper doneness. Guide the cook on even cooking and avoiding dry chicken.
